i have a question about upgrading ubuntu: 2 upgrades is really painful. Most people would install 9.10 from scratch. Or wait a couple of months and then install the new 10.04

all the samba config is in /etc/samba. Just save the directory and restore it after the install and with a bit of luck, it will all just work like it did before. In fact, back up the entire /etc and 99% of your config will be saved...
